Advanced visualization

Sölvi Rögnvaldsson, Axel Örn Jansson, Rafael Vias and Birgir Hrafnkelsson

Source: vignettes/advanced_visualization.Rmd
advanced_visualization.Rmd
> #load the packages needed for this vignette
> library(bdrc)
> library(ggplot2)

We will use a dataset from a river called x in Iceland that comes with the package:

> data(V316_river)
> V316_river
#>         W     Q
#> 1  1.2380  8.05
#> 2  1.2470  8.37
